solution_line_template: If for every ${spend_for_discount} spent I save ${discount_per_increment}, then for ${initial_purchase_amount} spend I'd save ${discount_per_increment}*{num_increments}=${total_discount}
If my total was ${initial_purchase_amount}, then I ended up paying ${initial_purchase_amount}-${total_discount}=$<<{initial_purchase_amount}-{total_discount}={final_payment}>>{final_payment}
